title: PR Review Needed Configuration
description: Configuration file for the pr-review-needed tool, which generates a markdown summary of Azure DevOps pull requests that need review.

$schema.description: The JSON schema reference for this configuration file.

repositories.description: List of Azure DevOps Git repositories to monitor for open pull requests.

url.description: The full Azure DevOps repository URL in the format https://dev.azure.com/{org}/{project}/_git/{repo}.

skipRestartMerge.description: When true, skip automatically restarting merge for stale pull requests in this repository. Defaults to false.

ignorePatterns.description: List of glob patterns for files to ignore during review. These typically represent generated files that should not be reviewed. Ignored files are excluded from size calculations and label-pattern matching.

items.description: A glob pattern such as '**/*.generated.cs' or '**/*.designer.cs'.

labelPatterns.description: List of label rules. When changed files in a PR match the specified patterns (excluding ignored files), the PR is labeled with the given label.

label.description: The label to apply to the PR when any changed file matches the patterns.

patterns.description: List of glob patterns. If any non-ignored changed file matches, the label is applied.

items.description: A glob pattern such as '**/azure-pipelines*.yml' or '**/Dockerfile'.

teamMembers.description: List of team member email addresses (or ADO unique names) whose pull requests should be tracked. These are used to distinguish team PRs from external ones.

items.description: An email address or ADO unique name identifying a team member.

manager.description: Email address of a direct manager. When provided, the tool will automatically fetch that manager's direct reports from Microsoft Graph and add them to the team members list.

orgManager.description: Email address of an org-level manager. When provided, the tool will recursively fetch all members of that manager's organization from Microsoft Graph and add them to the team members list.

ignoreManagers.description: When true, managers resolved via 'manager' or 'orgManager' are added to the ignored-users list and excluded from review-needed calculations. Useful for excluding managers who rarely review PRs. Defaults to false.

botUsers.description: List of bot or service-account email addresses to exclude from reviewer and author calculations entirely.

items.description: An email address or ADO unique name identifying a bot or service account.

quantifier.description: Configuration for the PR size quantifier, which labels pull requests by the total number of changed lines.

enabled.description: Whether to compute and display PR size labels. Defaults to true.

excludedPatterns.description: List of glob patterns for files whose line changes should be excluded from the size calculation (e.g. generated files, lock files).

items.description: A glob pattern such as '**/*.generated.cs' or 'package-lock.json'.

thresholds.description: Ordered list of size thresholds that map a maximum number of changed lines to a label. The first threshold whose maxChanges is greater than or equal to the PR's total changes is used. If the PR exceeds all thresholds it receives the last label.

label.description: The human-readable size label assigned when the PR falls within this threshold.

maxChanges.description: The maximum total number of changed lines (additions + deletions) that maps to this label.

restartMergeAfterDays.description: Number of days after which a pull request with a stale merge status will have its merge automatically restarted. Set to a negative value to disable auto-restart globally. Defaults to 30.
